caption.p: Heatmap of differential gene expression of GSE63514 in the normal cervix, CIN1, −2 and −3 lesions, and cancer. (A) The top 100 up‐regulated differentially expressed genes from 276 genes in the Intersection of five GEO datasets. (B) The top 100 down‐regulated differentially expressed genes from 206 genes in the Intersection of five GEO datasets
